00050 
00051 typedef uint8_t GroupType;
00052 
00053 
00055 
00056 
00057 class GroupAttributeArray : public TypedAttributeArray<GroupType, NullAttributeCodec<GroupType> >
00058 {
00059 public:
00061     explicit GroupAttributeArray(   size_t n = 1,
00062                                     const ValueType& uniformValue = zeroVal<ValueType>());
00064     GroupAttributeArray(const GroupAttributeArray& array,
00065                         const bool decompress = false);
00066 
00068     static GroupAttributeArray& cast(AttributeArray& attributeArray);
00069 
00071     static const GroupAttributeArray& cast(const AttributeArray& attributeArray);
00072 
00074     static bool isGroup(const AttributeArray& attributeArray);
00075 
00078     void setGroup(bool state);
00080     bool isGroup() const { return bool(mFlags & GROUP); }
00081 
00082 }; // class GroupAttributeArray
00083 
00084 
00085 inline GroupAttributeArray&
00086 GroupAttributeArray::cast(AttributeArray& attributeArray)
00087 {
00088     if (!attributeArray.isType<GroupAttributeArray>()) {
00089         OPENVDB_THROW(TypeError, "Invalid Attribute Type");
00090     }
00091     return static_cast<GroupAttributeArray&>(attributeArray);
00092 }
00093 
00094 
00095 inline const GroupAttributeArray&
00096 GroupAttributeArray::cast(const AttributeArray& attributeArray)
00097 {
00098     if (!attributeArray.isType<GroupAttributeArray>()) {
00099         OPENVDB_THROW(TypeError, "Invalid Attribute Type");
00100     }
00101     return static_cast<const GroupAttributeArray&>(attributeArray);
00102 }
00103 
00104 
00105 inline bool
00106 GroupAttributeArray::isGroup(const AttributeArray& attributeArray)
00107 {
00108     if (!attributeArray.isType<GroupAttributeArray>())  return false;
00109 
00110     return GroupAttributeArray::cast(attributeArray).isGroup();
00111 }

00117 class GroupHandle
00118 {
00119 public:
00120     // Dummy class that distinguishes an offset from a bitmask on construction
00121     struct BitMask { };
00122 
00123     typedef std::pair<size_t, uint8_t> GroupIndex;
00124 
00125     GroupHandle(const GroupAttributeArray& array, const GroupType& offset);
00126     GroupHandle(const GroupAttributeArray& array, const GroupType& bitMask, BitMask);
00127 
00128     size_t size() const { return mArray.size(); }
00129     bool isUniform() const { return mArray.isUniform(); }
00130 
00131     bool get(Index n) const;
00132 
00133 protected:
00134     const GroupAttributeArray& mArray;
00135     const GroupType mBitMask;
00136 }; // class GroupHandle

00155 
00157 class GroupFilter
00158 {
00159 public:
00160     GroupFilter(const GroupHandle& handle)
00161         : mHandle(handle) { }
00162 
00163     bool valid(const Index32 offset) const {
00164         return mHandle.get(offset);
00165     }
00166 
00167 private:
00168     const GroupHandle mHandle;
00169 }; // class GroupFilter

00174 
00175 class GroupFilterFromLeaf
00176 {
00177 public:
00178     typedef GroupFilter Filter;
00179 
00180     GroupFilterFromLeaf(const Name& name)
00181         : mName(name) { }
00182 
00183     template <typename LeafT>
00184     Filter fromLeaf(const LeafT& leaf) const {
00185         return Filter(leaf.groupHandle(mName));
00186     }
00187 
00188 private:
00189     const Name mName;
00190 }; // GroupFilterFromLeaf
